achievements.name: In the beginning was the Word...
achievements.description: Complete your very first study session.

achievements.name: Hasta la Vista, Laziness!
achievements.description: Achieve a streak of 2 consecutive study sessions without missing a day.

achievements.name: Concentration Commando!
achievements.description: Finish 5 consecutive study sessions with no distractions.

achievements.name: Mission: Fifteen
achievements.description: Achieve your daily study goals for 15 sessions.

achievements.name: Mission: Thirty
achievements.description: Achieve your daily study goals for 30 sessions.

achievements.name: Laser Focus
achievements.description: Keep the total number of distractions and pauses below 3 per session.

achievements.name: No Breaks, No Mercy!
achievements.description: Achieve your daily study goal without any breaks and pauses at the end of the session.

achievements.name: Go Long or Go Home!
achievements.description: Complete a session lasting more than 3 hours with no distractions and at most 2 pauses.

achievements.name: If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.
achievements.description: Begin a study session with a daily goal exceeding 4 hours.

achievements.name: Jack of All Trades
achievements.description: Cover at least 3 different topics during one session.
